one of several parts that together make up a whole machine, system etc
companies that make electronic components for computer products
Exercise is one of the key components of a healthy lifestyle.
the component parts of something are the parts that it consists of
We’ve been breaking down the budget into its component parts.
Gas will continue to be a major component of the country’s energy supply mix.
The main component of any school’s budget will be the cost of staff.
The M2 component of the money supply grew $7.2 billion in April.
one part used in making a machine, vehicle etc
auto components (=ones used in cars) company
a small company that makes electronic components
